CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Gong__Contact_Participant__c) , IF( ISBLANK(Gong__Lead_Participant__c) , IF( ISBLANK(Gong__User_Participant__c) , Gong__Full_Name_Temp__c , Gong__User_Participant__r.FirstName & " " &Gong__User_Participant__r.LastName), Gong__Lead_Participant__r.FirstName &" " &Gong__Lead_Participant__r.LastName ), Gong__Contact_Participant__r.FirstName & " " & Gong__Contact_Participant__r.LastName )
CustomField.label: Participant Full Name
